feature_evidence.json: Describes a feature evidence report for refactoring markup into semantic HTML, listing affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for key frontend source files and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH CSS variables defining light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document mounting the React app via a root div and script module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React component rendering a semantic layout with header, main content section, and footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages backend actors tied to Internet Identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for authenticating with Internet Identity and managing identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Example React Query hook wired to the actor for backend requests.
frontend/src/index.css: Duplicate Tailwind/OKLCH base styles defining theme variables for UI components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point configuring QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, and container settings with OKLCH tokens.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, features, and requests related to semantic HTML restructuring.
